column6: A SHADOW FALLS OVER AN ARMORED UTOPIA! TECHNOPOLIS:  Amazing Domain of science and wonder created by rival genius brothers TONY AND ARNO STARK.  A utopia except...a unique disease forces EVERYONE to wear armor to live and breathe. In this armored land a hero is murdered and the killer's identity a mystery Baron Tony Stark must solve. But in doing so, will Technopolis be forced into a civil war?
column8: | penciller (cover):Paul Rivoche | writer:James Robinson | artist:Marcio Takara
